articles.title: The US Relinquishes Its Role as a Leader in Refugee Resettlement
articles.description: By dramatically reducing the admission cap for the upcoming fiscal year, the administration seems to be abandoning the country’s longstanding commitment to help those fleeing war and persecution.

articles.description: Former Iowa State golfer Celia Barquin Arozamena, 22, was found dead at an Ames golf course and a suspect has been charged with first-degree murder.
articles.content: A 22-year-old man has been charged with first-degree murder in the death of Iowa State golfer Celia Barquin Arozamena, the 2018 Big 12 champion and the school's female athlete of the year. Barquin Arozamena, 22, was found dead Monday at a golf course in Ames,… [+4085 chars]

articles.description: Physicians in Berlin say that anti-Kremlin activist Pyotr Verzilov's illness does not appear to be caused by infection or disease. But they could not confirm what he was poisoned with, or by whom.
